thread.section_title: banggood 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 banggood 的点评意见 | www.banggood.com
thread.title: Παναγιώτης Κ.
thread.title_full: banggood 的点评人 Παναγιώτης Κ.

author: Παναγιώτης Κ.
title: Παναγιώτης Κ.
text:
i bought a hdmi compute stick (pipo x1s) about 3 months ago. unfortunately it was defective and i sent them email to find a solution about the item. my first contact with them wasn't good. they delayed to respond my emails and they were looking for excuses to delay more, so i opened a ticket to paypal. after that and after contacting via paypal, their attitude changed. really fast responds and we found a solution very quickly.
i do recommend using this site. i have never lost money and in the end, more or less, i am always satisfied.
